attributes.additional_details:
The Governement should consider their own people first before they decide to donate money for foreign aid. The coaltion Governement by closing the disabled Remploy are caring more for the foriegn countries than they are their own, Remploy people that are more vunerable and need help NOW and from their own.
The last increase 36% would more than cover, and the further subseqeunt donations would cover for the so called loss. In fact the increase would cover for many many other vital services.
The Governeemt, by closing down this service are only showing they want a good face for the rest of the world, foreigners and cant be bothered by their own peoples plight
